whyDataetica.title: Why DataÉtica?
whyDataetica.subtitle: We live in a crucial moment in human history.

automatedDecisions.title: Automated Decisions
automatedDecisions.description: We live in an era where technology makes decisions that affect our daily lives: what we see, what opportunities we receive, how we are evaluated.

understandingGap.description: Many people don't understand how the algorithms around them work, creating a dangerous disconnect between technology and society.

knowledgeDemocratization.description: We create accessible content to democratize knowledge about digital ethics, making complex concepts understandable to everyone.

consciousFuture.title: Conscious Future
consciousFuture.description: We foster critical thinking and citizen participation to build a more conscious and ethical technological future.

whyDataetica.quote: "Digital ethics is not only the responsibility of technologists, it is the responsibility of all of us as citizens of the digital age."
